property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: The colour scheme variant to be used.

property.name: autoFocus
property.label: Autofocus
property.description: Set to have the input field automatically get focused.

property.name: inputLabel
property.label: Input label
property.description: Set the visually hidden label for the input field for accessibility.

property.name: inputValue
property.label: Input value
property.description: Set to have an initial value in the input field.

property.name: submitLabel
property.label: Submit label
property.description: Label used for the submit button.

property.name: suggestions
property.label: Suggestions
property.description: A static set of suggestions as a JSON string array.

property.name: maxSuggestionsDisplayed
property.label: Max suggestions displayed
property.description: Maximum number of suggestions to display in the dropdown.

property.name: placeholder
property.label: Placeholder
property.description: Placeholder text displayed in a lighter colour when input is empty.

property.name: showNoResults
property.label: Show no results
property.description: Set if the users should get feedback when there are no suggestions.
